title: Mahou Senshi Louie (Rune Soldier)
synopsis: Louie, a brawny student at the mage's guild, is reluctantly accepted by three girls (Merrill-thief, Genie-fighter, and Melissa-priestess) as a companion for their adventuring party. As the foursome explore ruins, battle dark creatures, and make new friends, they also uncover a sinister plot within the kingdom.
voices: ['Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Kawakami, Tomoko', 'Inoue, Kikuko', 'Yajima, Akiko', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Yamazaki, Takumi', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Tachiki, Fumihiko', 'Kasahara, Rumi']
staff: [['Koyama, Yoshitaka', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kuzuya, Naoyuki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ishidou, Hiroyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Nishimoto, Yukio', ['Storyboard']]]
